channel.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
channel.description:
Hello, When i change something in [b]Client.jave[/b] ( the welcome massage ) and i click save. and i click on [b]compile.bat[/b] it says : 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
i press a key and it just goes away and helps nothing
in it is : [code]@echo off
javac -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -classpath . *.java -g
pause[/code]
i got java version 6 update 12
and the source is use is dodian How i can fix this ?

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

still doesn’t work.

and i use a dodian souce idk if that’s a difference ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2009, 12:56:38 pm[/size][hr]is here nobody who can help me ??

i need it plz >;[

Read full topic

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

Right click edit and add this.

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You need to set your classpath.

Read full topic
item.source: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command,

item.title: 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Delete you compiler and open a new notepad file
add this into it

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
And then name it compiler.bat
and then place it in you server file, there you go it should work

Read full topic
